articles.title: Kohli dances to Nepali song, enters Nepal dressing room after Asia Cup match - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Despite not getting the opportunity to bat and having an average day in the field, Virat Kohli was in high spirits in the Asia Cup match vs Nepal. | Cricket
articles.content: It seems like Virat Kohli has opened a new chapter in his cricket career, one that is not always about bat and ball and is not entirely driven by aggression but instead a few laughs with the oppositi… [+2818 chars]

articles.title: Stocks Fall on Weak China PMI; Aussie Dollar Falls: Markets Wrap - Yahoo Finance
articles.description: European stocks and US futures followed Asian markets lower as disappointing data renewed concern over China's fragile economic recovery.
articles.content:
